header.name: Vault of the Forgotten King
header.author: John Nash (converted by System Converter)
header.description: A one-page dungeon of pits, devils, howling altars and a wight king.

rooms.name: 1. Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Carvings of thieves dying; secret door opened by pressing a carved monster’s head.

rooms.name: 2. Store
rooms.description: Ancient tools, ropes and pulleys. Tree roots block and conceal the eastern exit.

rooms.name: 3. Red Devil Room
rooms.description: Red devil faces leer from ceiling corners. Sound of water from the north. Covered pit 10 ft deep.

rooms.name: 4. Pit
rooms.description: Rough, damp stone. 4 Giant Beetles crawl across ceiling and walls.

rooms.name: 5. Pool
rooms.description: Water falls from 8 ft above into a deep pool. A Giant Frog hides within, waiting for prey.

rooms.name: 6. Viewing Gallery
rooms.description: Benches around a 10-ft pit. Rusty ladder in wall. Polished metal chute exits south wall into pit.

rooms.name: 7. Pit Beast Lair
rooms.description: Rough chamber. Tentacle beast waits for prey falling from #6. Coins and red sapphires under old bones.

rooms.name: 8. Altar Room
rooms.description: Alabaster altar north wall with howling head. Full-length mirror on south wall conceals #9. Spells here are boosted and announced by the head.

rooms.name: 9. Architect’s Office
rooms.description: Desk, chair and papers. A ghast sits at the desk and will eat anyone who interrupts. A treasure map can be found among the papers.

rooms.name: 10. Running Water
rooms.description: Fast stream from grate in north wall, down a floor channel into a south tunnel. A silvered longsword rests on a west-wall plinth. Water surges when entered, washing to #5. The silvered sword is the key to #12.

rooms.name: 11. Howling Room
rooms.description: Domed ceiling; storm carvings. Moaning mouth on west wall. Metal funnel in east wall descends into a chute. Large lever on south wall—opens #12 portcullis and blasts wind from the mouth pushing creatures into chute.

rooms.name: 12. Gatehouse
rooms.description: Carvings of skeletons killing thieves. A desiccated corpse speared upon the portcullis. South door bears a heart-shaped carving with a key slot.

rooms.name: 13. Blue Devil Room
rooms.description: Crying blue devil faces in ceiling corners. Covered pit 10 ft deep.

rooms.name: 14. King’s Throne
rooms.description: Echoing, frosted hall. A wight king sits on a throne; 8 skeletal guards drill in the hall below. Chest of coins behind throne. West door locked; key hangs on chain around the wight’s neck.

rooms.name: 15. Vault
rooms.description: Metal-walled. Coffers on benches; old ledgers. Many coins and a ring of plant control. Scroll with 3 spells under a ledger. North-west door opens by hand crank.

rooms.name: 16. Dropping Passage
rooms.description: Split passage: lower north end and a south end 10 ft higher. No handle on this side of the southern door.

doors.notes: Press carved monster’s head to open.
Full-length mirror slides aside to reveal office.
Southern door has heart-shaped key slot; unlocked by the silvered sword from #10.
West door from throne room locked; key on chain around the wight’s neck.
